title: A Demotion Isn’t That Bad - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Medieval   Younger Love Interests
author: Kirishima Maruha   霧島まるは
description:
Ulysses, a brilliant but inflexible soldier, is shunned by the top brass and demoted to a station in a rural area where he meets his new wife Leah. The demotion that should’ve been a terrible thing turns into a blessing as Leah and her siblings teach the boorish Ulysses about family and love.

A soothing daily life fantasy about a silent military man and a clumsy new wife.>
